reviewText:
This movie is easily a 4 star. Unfortunately, the comedy was too long and dragged on, thus took away from the good of this flick.  This flick was comedy after comedy, approximately 75-80% which became some-what boaring.

However, there is no qestion about the fight scenes,,,,simply amazing.  Yes, I gave this flick a 3 star, but definately a 5 star performace for the fight scenes!!  Not a bad idea for the collection!!
